title: (1), (2), (3), (4), (5) and (7) of section 11 of the Health Identifiers Act 2014 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health Identifiers Act 2014
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health Identifiers Act 2014 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health identifier act 2014 (commencement) order 2022

title: (1), (2), (3), (4), (5) and (7) of section 11 of the Health Identifiers Act 2014 (No.
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which subsections
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which subsections 
(1), (2), (3), (4), (5) and (7) of section 11 of the Health Identifiers Act 2014 (No. 
15 of 2014) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [154] 3

title: (1), (2), (3), (4), (5) and (7) of section 11 of the Health Identifiers Act 2014 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order brings those subsections of section 11 of the Health Identifiers Act 
(No. 15 of 2014) not already in force into operation. This will support the greater 
use of the Individual Health Identifier in the health system by those persons 
permitted by the Act to use it. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [154]
